00009 #include "TTCrossfade.h"

00011 
00012 TTCrossfade::TTCrossfade(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels)
00014 {
00015         registerParameter(TT("position"),       kTypeFloat32,   &attrPosition);
00016         registerParameter(TT("shape"),          kTypeSymbol,    &attrShape,             (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTCrossfade::setShape);
00017         registerParameter(TT("mode"),           kTypeSymbol,    &attrMode,              (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTCrossfade::setMode);
00018 
00019         // Set Defaults (the parameter setters will set the process method for us)...
00020         setParameterValue(TT("position"),       0.5);
00021         setParameterValue(TT("shape"),          TT("equalPower"));
00022         setParameterValue(TT("mode"),           TT("lookup"));
00023 }
00024 
00025 
00026 TTCrossfade::~TTCrossfade()
00027 {
00028         ;
00029 }

00031 
00032 TTErr TTCrossfade::setShape(const TTValue& newValue)
00033 {
00034         attrShape = &(TTSymbol&)newValue;
00035         return setProcessPointers();
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 TTErr TTCrossfade::setMode(const TTValue& newValue)
00040 {
00041         attrMode = &(TTSymbol&)newValue;
00042         return setProcessPointers();
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 TTErr TTCrossfade::setProcessPointers()
00047 {
00048         if(attrShape == &TT("equalPower") && attrMode == &TT("lookup"))
00049                 return setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTCrossfade::processLookup);
00050         else if(attrShape == &TT("equalPower") && attrMode == &TT("calculate"))
00051                 return setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTCrossfade::processCalc);
00052         else
00053                 return setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTCrossfade::processLinear);
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 TTErr TTCrossfade::processLinear(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00058 {
00059         short                   vs;
00060         TTSampleValue   *inSampleA,
00061                                         *inSampleB,
00062                                         *outSample;
00063         short                   numchannels = out.numChannels;
00064         short                   channel;
00065         
00066         if(in.numChannels != out.numChannels*2)
00067                 return kTTErrGeneric;
00068 
00069         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00070                 inSampleA = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00071                 inSampleB = in.sampleVectors[numchannels+channel];
00072                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00073                 vs = in.vs;
00074                 
00075                 while(vs--)
00076                         *outSample++ = (*inSampleB++ * attrPosition) + (*inSampleA++ * (1.0 - attrPosition));
00077         }
00078         return kTTErrNone;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 TTErr TTCrossfade::processLookup(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00083 {
00084         short                   vs;
00085         TTSampleValue   *inSampleA,
00086                                         *inSampleB,
00087                                         *outSample;
00088         short                   numchannels = out.numChannels;
00089         short                   channel;
00090         int                             index;
00091         
00092         if(in.numChannels != out.numChannels*2)
00093                 return kTTErrGeneric;
00094 
00095         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00096                 inSampleA = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00097                 inSampleB = in.sampleVectors[numchannels+channel];
00098                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00099                 vs = in.vs;
00100                 
00101                 while(vs--){
00102                         index = (int)(attrPosition * 511.0);
00103                         *outSample++ = (*inSampleB++ * kTTLookupEqualPower[511 - index]) + (*inSampleA++ * kTTLookupEqualPower[index]);
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         return kTTErrNone;
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 TTErr TTCrossfade::processCalc(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00111 {
00112         short                   vs;
00113         TTSampleValue   *inSampleA,
00114                                         *inSampleB,
00115                                         *outSample;
00116         short                   numchannels = out.numChannels;
00117         short                   channel;
00118         
00119         if(in.numChannels != out.numChannels*2)
00120                 return kTTErrGeneric;
00121 
00122         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00123                 inSampleA = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00124                 inSampleB = in.sampleVectors[numchannels+channel];
00125                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00126                 vs = in.vs;
00127                 
00128                 while(vs--)
00129                         *outSample++ = (*inSampleB++ * (sin(attrPosition * 1.5707963))) + (*inSampleA++ * (sin((1 - attrPosition) * 1.5707963)));
00130         }
00131         return kTTErrNone;
00132 }
